originalText.text: First time taking my 75lb Alaskan Husky, very impressed by the service. Carol Ann and Juan were very attentive and patient with my fur baby. Given how strong and big my dog is. His service consisted of a bath and de-shedding add on. He came out looking like a stud!!! Definitely will be back for future services.

originalText.text: Just got my Baby Stanleys nails trimmed and the expeirence great! Loving the professionalism. Highly recommend the services and more coming soon! Definitely coming back soon!

text.text: Just got my Baby Stanleys nails trimmed and the expeirence great! Loving the professionalism. Highly recommend the services and more coming soon! Definitely coming back soon!

originalText.text: Heaven ( left on the pic ) has been going there since she was a puppy. She loves this place and is always rushing to go and gets back happy and tired ! I have moved out from the neighborhood but I still drive an hour to leave her there when I travel as I trust only Carol to take good care of her. Every time I come to pick her up the dogs seem to be having a blast and the staff is always very cautious about safety protocoles with food/ play time/ interactions etc .

originalText.text:
I have been taking my Blue French Bulldog here for almost a month now. I love the atmosphere and he loves the treatment he gets. He comes home exhausted with playing with his friends which makes my weekly life so much easier. The prices are really good for the services they provide and the staff is super nice and friendly. Business is a bit hidden but once you find it you will never forget it.
Update 11/17/20
They are awesome. I have a Blue French Bulldog and Carrol is amazing. My wife first took him in to check if he played well with other pets. Ever since then he has been in love with the daycare. We take him almost every day and the price is amazing. He gets to socialize while we are at work and when we get home he is perfect for someone who works all day and wants to play a bit then relax. They treat your pet like its theirs and whenever there is an emergency they are capable of handling it until you can get there. I have 100% trust in this place and will continue my care for as long as I can.

originalText.text:
We left our dog at this daycare while away on a trip and came back to him in terrible shape. His paw was so irritated that he didn’t want to walk on it, his eyes were full of gunk and he could barely keep them open, and he had a runny nose. While I don’t think my dog was mistreated, Carol Ann failed to communicate that anything was wrong which is a huge problem. When my husband asked her if she noticed anything while there she proceeded to say “well he did have a slight cough at one point, but I called and told you”. This was a complete lie, she never called him once while we were away. Since then we’ve had to take him to the vet twice, my dog has not been the same at all, lacks energy, is throwing up and not once has she even been sympathetic or apologetic. Instead she was defensive, rude, talked over him when he was trying to explain everything that was going on, and sounded like she was whining more than anything. We later realized that while she asked if my dog was vaccinated, she never asked for the proof and so I think she doesn’t check for proper documentation- allowing anyone to leave their dog at her daycare.
Lesson learned, never again.
